subject: Data
title: Web3 and Data Decentralization
description: A quick win: understand Web3 and Data Decentralization.

hook.text: Web3 promises to break Big Tech's data monopoly by putting users in control of their own information.

buildup.text: Using blockchain and decentralized protocols, Web3 envisions platforms where users own their data natively.

discovery.text: Decentralized identity systems let you prove credentials without revealing personal details to platforms.

twist.text: Critics argue Web3 has mostly enriched crypto speculators while failing to deliver on data ownership promises.

climax.text: Whether Web3 succeeds or fails, the desire for data self-sovereignty has permanently entered the conversation.

punchline.text: Decentralization is the dream. Execution is the challenge.

quiz.question: What does Web3 promise regarding personal data?
options: User ownership and control of personal data through decentralization
